this_title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Return Season 1
trans_title: 神秘科学剧院3000：归来 第一季
introduction: Set in the future, a space scientist who works for Gizmodo is lured to the dark side of the moon. He is sat in front of cheesy movies with his robot buddies and forced to torturously watch bad movies in their entirety as these aliens study the affects on his mind.
chinese_title: 神秘科学剧院3000：归来 第一季
foreign_title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Return Season 1
